data.chText: （用来强调事物的大小、程度或数量）
data.enText: used to emphasize the size, degree or amount of sth

data.chText: 这一地区由于游客人数太多而面临威胁。
data.enText: The area is under threat from the sheer number of tourists using it.

data.chText: 大教堂的宏大规模给我们留下了深刻的印象。
data.enText: We were impressed by the sheer size of the cathedral.
complete and not mixed with anything else

data.chText: 这场音乐会是一次十足的享受。
data.enText: The concert was sheer delight.
I only agreed out of sheer desperation.
very steep
sheer cliffs/slopes

data.chText: 外面是一道陡坡，直插大海。
data.enText: Outside there was a sheer drop down to the sea below.
thin, light and almost transparent
sheer nylon
straight up or down

data.chText: 悬崖从海滩上拔地而起。
data.enText: The cliffs rise sheer from the beach.
The ground dropped sheer away at our feet.
sheer away/off (from sth)
to change direction suddenly, especially in order to avoid hitting sth

data.chText: 她有意不去想那些她不愿多想的事情。
data.enText: Her mind sheered away from images she did not wish to dwell on.

word_means: 用来强调事物的大小、程度或数量

means: 用来强调事物的大小、程度或数量

data.enText: sheer away/off (from sth)
to change direction suddenly, especially in order to avoid hitting sth

data.chText: 她有意不去想那些她不愿多想的事情。
data.enText: Her mind sheered away from images she did not wish to dwell on.

example: She sheered her car around the obstacle
The car cut to the left at the intersection
The motorbike veered to the right

tr: having a prominent and almost vertical front
example: where the bold chalk cliffs of England rise

tr: so thin as to transmit light
example: a hat with a diaphanous veil
he fell sheer into the water

tr: straight up or down without a break

value.def: You can use sheer to emphasize that a state or situation is complete and does not involve or is not mixed with anything else.

example.tran: 听他的音乐完全是一种享受。

example.ex: Sheer chance quite often plays an important part in sparking off an idea.
example.tran: 灵感的激发通常纯粹是靠运气。

value.tran: (用于强调)纯粹的，完全的，十足的

value.def: A sheer cliff or drop is extremely steep or completely vertical.

example.ex: There was a sheer drop just outside my window...
A young man plunged from a sheer rock face to his death.
example.tran: 一名男青年从陡峭的岩壁上坠崖身亡。

value.def: Sheer material is very thin, light, and delicate.
